snippet: The 2014 Olympic Games have been a pet project for President Vladimir V. Putin, but critics see Russia’s role as inviting international scrutiny on issues like human rights and civil liberties.
abstract: Russia's hosting of 2014 Olympic Games in Sochi are pet project for Pres Vladimir V Putin, but critics see Russia’s role as inviting international scrutiny on issues like human rights and civil liberties.
lead_paragraph: The 2014 Olympic Games have been a pet project for President Vladimir V. Putin, but critics see Russia’s role as inviting international scrutiny on issues like human rights and civil liberties.

headline.seo: Putin’s Vision of Olympic Glory Meets Reality in Sochi
headline.main: Putin’s Vision of Olympic Glory Meets a More Earthbound Reality in Sochi
headline.print_headline: Putin’s Vision of Olympic Glory Meets a More Earthbound Reality in Sochi
